text: Carlos Diegues (also known as Cacá Diegues; 19 May 1940 – 14 February 2025) was a Brazilian movie director. He was best known as a member of the Cinema Novo movement. In 2018, Diegues was elected to the Brazilian Academy of Letters. Diegues died from problems caused by surgery in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on 14 February 2025, at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Brazilian movie directors Category:Brazilian screenwriters Category:Brazilian movie producers Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro
title: Carlos Diegues
